scripts.program-edit-input-path: node dist/program.command.js --exercise-start 01022018 --metadata ./metadata.json --edit --edit-short --input-csv 'depenses: data/depenses.csv, depensesPieces:  data/depenses-pieces.csv, saisiePieces: data/saisie-pieces.csv, balanceReouverture: data/balance-reouverture.csv, planComptable: data/plan-comptable.csv, journaux: data/journaux.csv' --output-dir Output
scripts.program-edit-input-name: node dist/program.command.js --exercise-start 01022018 --metadata ./metadata.json --edit --edit-short --input-csv 'depenses: depenses.csv, depensesPieces: depenses-pieces.csv, saisiePieces: saisie-pieces.csv, balanceReouverture: balance-reouverture.csv, planComptable: plan-comptable.csv, journaux: journaux.csv'  --output-dir Output
scripts.program-edit-input-partial: node dist/program.command.js --exercise-start 01022018 --metadata ./metadata.json --edit --edit-short --input-csv 'depenses: depenses.csv, depensesPieces: depenses-pieces.csv, saisiePieces: saisie-pieces.csv, balanceReouverture: balance-reouverture.csv' --output-dir Output
scripts.editters: node dist/program.command.js --exercise-start 01022018 --input-ods data/comptabilite.ods --metadata ./metadata.json --edit  --output-dir Output --editters console --editters csv --editters json --edit-short
